name: The Office Computer
description:
The Office Computer is a short first-person horror game that takes place in an office environment. You the player must hide, run, and more importantly find the GRAPHICS CARDS in order to SURVIVE. This all started because Anna down in HR decided to download some Russian virus that has now turned her computer into a KILLING MACHINE. That you the player have to run from and find graphics cards in order to get out of the office

So good luck and try not to get K̷̖̀I̶̠̕L̶͓̈́L̵̡̅E̶̞͠D̶̫̀.

How To Play:

- "W,A,S,D" to move 

- "Q" to pick up things

- "Shift" to run

- "F" turn on/off flashlight

- Mouse to control camera

Assets Used To Make The Game: 

- https://nieb.itch.io/modern-office-3d-assets

- https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/electronics/computer/rtx-3080

- https://opengameart.org/

- Footsteps Sound Effects | Footstep Sound

- Running Footsteps Sound Effects All Sounds

- https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-house-collection

- https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Major+Mono+Display?category=Monospace&preview....
